Title: Requires a sentence of life imprisonment without parole for murder in the first degree, aggravated murder, and murder in the second degree
Summary: Requires a sentence of life imprisonment without parole for murder in the first degree, aggravated murder, and murder in the second degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring a sentence of life without parole for convictions of murder in the second degree, aggravated murder, and murder in the first degree
